tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_ratings (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT,
    service_type VARCHAR(50),
    service_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE hotel_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hotel_name VARCHAR(255),
    rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE airline_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airline_name VARCHAR(255),
    rating INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE hotels (hotel_id INT, name VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(50), rating FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE airlines (airline_id INT, name VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(50), rating FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE travel_services (service_id INT, name VARCHAR(50), type VARCHAR(50), rating FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE feedback (feedback_id INT, user_id INT, service_id INT, rating FLOAT, comment TEXT);
